content.name: TerraCorp Sleipnir
content.description: This mod adds the Sleipnir transporter to the game. The Sleipnir is based on the Katana and was designed by TerraCoprp as a better alternative for the Baldric.
content.author: Sir_Leon

text.name: TerraCorp Sleipnir
text.description: Adds the sleipnir to the game.
text.author: Sir_Leon

text.name: TerraCorp Sleipnir
text.description: Fügt die sleipnir zum Spiel hinzu.
text.author: Sir_Leon
